sentences.english: The Maybach has been adopted as the ultimate status symbol by Russia's super-rich.
sentences.chinese: 邁巴赫被視作俄國超級富豪的”終極身份象徵“。

sentences.english: Charm is the ultimate weapon, the supreme seduction, against which there are few defenses.
sentences.chinese: 魅力是終極武器，是極度誘惑，並且它天下無敵。

sentences.english: It is ultimate end target to compose inside pursue that text quality lay equal stress on.
sentences.chinese: 文質並重是寫作中追求的終極目標。

sentences.english: The velocity of light is the ultimate speed limit, being part of the very structure of space and time.
sentences.chinese: 作爲時空結構的一部分，光速是終極速度極限。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the ultra-marathoner might outlive us all.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，終極馬拉松運動員可能比我們都要長壽。

sentences.english: My ultimate goal is to open a homemaking company of my own.
sentences.chinese: 我的終極目標是擁有一家自己的家政公司。

sentences.english: Download now and experience the ultimate soundboard.
sentences.chinese: 現在下載和體驗終極音板。

sentences.english: Perhaps sotsukon is the ultimate climax of that individualization.
sentences.chinese: 也許“卒婚”是這種個性化的終極表現。

sentences.english: Remember, to truly understand Ultimate Reality you
sentences.chinese: 記住，要真正領會終極實相，你得走出你的心智。

sentences.english: The removal of cellulite remains one of the holy grails of cosmetic dermatology.
sentences.chinese: 去除脂肪團至今仍是皮膚美容學上的終極目標之一。

sentences.english: Confucian philosophy in Song dynasty treats rite as ultimate concern and so it's called Neo-Confucian religious philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 宋儒哲學以“理”爲終極關懷，故稱之新儒教哲學。

sentences.english: It is the ultimate weapon of war in the Protoss arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 它是神族兵工廠所擁有的終極戰爭武器。

sentences.english: In March, China’s Zhejiang Geely Holding Group set itself up for the ultimate safety challenge.
sentences.chinese: 三月份，中國浙江吉利控股集團展開終極安全挑戰。

sentences.english: Where is the human fleet when Tigh, Tyrol, Anders and Foster discover that they are Cylons?
sentences.chinese: 當終極四人發現他們真正身份時，人類艦隊在哪裏？

sentences.english: Let more people own paroxysm such as natural silk quilt enjoy for team mission.
sentences.chinese: 讓更多的人擁有像蠶絲被那樣的終極享受爲團隊使命。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
